verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> were made alive when you <S%G5209><s%> were <S%G5607><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> in transgressions and <S%G2532><s%> sins, <S%G266><s%>

in <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you once <S%G4218><s%> walked <S%G4043><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the course <S%G165><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the prince <S%G758><s%> of the power <S%G1849><s%> of the air, <S%G109><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> works <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of disobedience; <S%G543><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> love <S%G26><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> he loved <S%G25><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%>

even <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G5607><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> were <S%G5607><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> through our trespasses, <S%G3900><s%> made us alive together with <S%G4806><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> (by grace <S%G5485><s%> you have been <S%G2075><s%> saved <S%G4982><s%>),

and <S%G2532><s%> raised <S%G4891><s%> us up with him, <S%G4891><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G4776><s%> us to sit with him <S%G4776><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> places in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the ages <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G1904><s%> he might show <S%G1731><s%> the exceeding <S%G5235><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> kindness <S%G5544><s%> toward <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%>

not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> works, <S%G2443><s%> that <S%G3361><s%> no one <S%G5100><s%> would boast. <S%G2744><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> his <S%G846><s%> workmanship, <S%G4161><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> good <S%G18><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> prepared <S%G4282><s%> before that <S%G2443><s%> we would walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> remember <S%G3421><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> you, <S%G5210><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> who are <S%G3588><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> "uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>" by <S%G5259><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> "circumcision, <S%G4061><s%>" (in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> made by hands <S%G5499><s%>);

that <S%G3754><s%> you were <S%G2258><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> separate <S%G5565><s%> from Christ, <S%G5547><s%> alienated <S%G526><s%> from the commonwealth <S%G4174><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strangers <S%G3581><s%> from the covenants <S%G1242><s%> of the promise, <S%G1860><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without God <S%G112><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> once <S%G4218><s%> were <S%G5607><s%> far off <S%G3112><s%> are made <S%G1096><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> both <S%G297><s%> one, <S%G1520><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> broke down <S%G3089><s%> the middle wall <S%G3320><s%> of partition, <S%G5418><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846><s%> might reconcile <S%G604><s%> them both <S%G297><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the cross, <S%G4716><s%> having killed <S%G615><s%> the hostility <S%G2189><s%> thereby. <S%G1722><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> and preached <S%G2097><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> who were <S%G3588><s%> far off <S%G3112><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to those who were <S%G3588><s%> near. <S%G1451><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> we <S%G2192><s%> both <S%G297><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> our access <S%G4318><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> then <S%G686><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> no longer <S%G3765><s%> strangers <S%G3581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> foreigners, <S%G3941><s%> but <S%G235><s%> you are fellow citizens <S%G4847><s%> with the saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the household <S%G3609><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>
